casebody.data:
2001-3158 (La. 10/14/02)

STATE ex rel. Robert SMITH v. STATE of Louisiana. No. 2001-KH-3158. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Smith, Robert;—Plaintiff; Applying for Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Richland, 5th Judicial District Court Div. C, No. F-97-52; to the *417Court of Appeal, Second Circuit, No. 35768-KH.

Denied.
